general.title: What is Bitcoin-Yay?
general.content: Bitcoin-Yay (BTCY) is a next-generation cryptocurrency designed as a “Micro Token of Bitcoin” – a smaller, more accessible unit tied to Bitcoin’s legacy.

general.title: How is Bitcoin-Yay different from Bitcoin?
general.content: Bitcoin-Yay uses an AI‑powered Proof‑of‑Participation consensus instead of energy‑intensive Proof‑of‑Work and offers sub‑second settlements with negligible fees making it more suitable for everyday use.

general.title: What does “Micro Token of Bitcoin” mean?
general.content: It means that Bitcoin-Yay units are defined so that one Bitcoin converts to one million BTCY lowering the entry barrier and enabling microtransactions.

general.title: What is the total supply of Bitcoin-Yay?
general.content: The total supply of Bitcoin-Yay is capped at 21 trillion BTCY to mirror Bitcoin’s 21 million cap at the micro‑token scale.

general.title: What is the conversion ratio between Bitcoin and Bitcoin-Yay?
general.content: The conversion ratio is set at one Bitcoin equals one million BTCY to preserve a value relationship tied to Bitcoin’s legacy.

general.title: How does Bitcoin-Yay control inflation?
general.content: Bitcoin-Yay controls inflation by cutting mining rewards in half every six months under a semi‑annual halving schedule.

general.title: What consensus mechanism does Bitcoin-Yay use?
general.content: Bitcoin-Yay uses a novel AI‑powered Proof‑of‑Participation consensus that rewards user engagement and network contribution instead of raw computing power.

general.title: What blockchain framework does Bitcoin-Yay operate on?
general.content: Bitcoin-Yay operates on a customized Stellar‑based blockchain framework augmented with smart contract support via Soroban and AI integration.

general.title: How does Bitcoin-Yay ensure fair distribution of tokens?
general.content: Fair distribution is achieved by rewarding both on‑chain engagement and in‑app participation rather than favoring those with specialized mining hardware.

general.title: What security measures protect the Bitcoin-Yay network?
general.content: Security measures include multi‑layer encryption AI‑powered threat detection a BFT validator model with slashing and support for light nodes in the mobile app.

general.title: Will Bitcoin-Yay become fully decentralized?
general.content: Yes Bitcoin-Yay plans to transition governance to a community‑run DAO over four development phases reaching full decentralization by around 2027.

general.title: What is the main goal of Bitcoin-Yay?
general.content: The main goal is to create a seamless user‑friendly and sustainable Bitcoin alternative that promotes wider everyday use of digital currency.

bitcoinyay.title: What is AI Mobile Mining?
bitcoinyay.content: AI Mobile Mining is a process where users complete AI‑assigned tasks on their smartphones and earn BTCY based on their engagement and AI Mining Score.

bitcoinyay.title: How do mining tasks work?
bitcoinyay.content: The AI Teacher analyzes behaviors that benefit the network and sends tailored lightweight tasks to user apps which earn token rewards on completion.

bitcoinyay.title: What is the AI Mining Score?
bitcoinyay.content: The AI Mining Score is a dynamic multiplier that reflects how actively a user engages in tasks referrals and community activities boosting their base mining rate.

bitcoinyay.title: What are Gopher Mining Tiers?
bitcoinyay.content: Gopher Mining Tiers segment users into participation levels including Snatch Gopher free tier Pocket Gopher referral program Nugget Gopher paid plans and Nerdy Gopher developer rewards.

bitcoinyay.title: What is the Snatch Gopher plan?
bitcoinyay.content: The Snatch Gopher plan is the free entry‑level mining tier with a base speed of one times allowing users to earn BTCY at no cost.

bitcoinyay.title: What is the Pocket Gopher program?
bitcoinyay.content: The Pocket Gopher program rewards users for referrals and content creation by granting bonus BTCY for community building activities.

bitcoinyay.title: What are the Nugget Gopher plans?
bitcoinyay.content: The Nugget Gopher plans are paid subscription tiers named Electric Turbo and Nuclear offering base mining speeds of three times six times and nine times respectively.

bitcoinyay.title: What is the Nerdy Gopher program?
bitcoinyay.content: The Nerdy Gopher program rewards developers and technical contributors through bounties and grants instead of hourly mining rates.

bitcoinyay.title: How often are mining rewards halved?
bitcoinyay.content: Mining rewards are halved every six months to manage inflation and preserve the token’s scarcity narrative.

bitcoinyay.title: Why does Bitcoin-Yay use AI in mining?
bitcoinyay.content: AI is used to optimize task difficulty prevent abuse personalize user experience and ensure fair reward distribution based on engagement.

bitcoinyay.title: How does the AI Mining Score affect earnings?
bitcoinyay.content: A higher AI Mining Score multiplies a user’s base mining rate so active participants can earn two to three times more BTCY than their base plan.

bitcoinyay.title: How does Bitcoin-Yay’s mining differ from Bitcoin’s mining?
bitcoinyay.content: Bitcoin-Yay mining replaces energy‑intensive hashing with AI‑driven participation tasks to democratize access and reduce environmental impact.

bitcoinyay.title: What benefits do paid mining plans offer?
bitcoinyay.content: Paid plans offer higher base mining speeds faster transaction processing priority withdrawals and additional community perks.

pricing.title: How much does it cost to start mining Bitcoin-Yay?
pricing.content: It is free to start mining with the Snatch Gopher plan requiring only minimal daily engagement tasks.

pricing.title: What are the subscription costs for paid mining plans?
pricing.content: Paid mining plans cost one hundred dollars three hundred dollars or six hundred dollars per month for Electric Turbo and Nuclear tiers respectively.

pricing.title: What is included in the Electric plan?
pricing.content: The Electric plan costs one hundred dollars per month and provides a base mining speed of three times the free rate.

pricing.title: What is included in the Turbo plan?
pricing.content: The Turbo plan costs three hundred dollars per month and provides a base mining speed of six times the free rate.

pricing.title: What is included in the Nuclear plan?
pricing.content: The Nuclear plan costs six hundred dollars per month and provides a base mining speed of nine times the free rate.

pricing.title: What is the mining speed multiplier for each paid plan?
pricing.content: The Electric plan offers a three times multiplier the Turbo plan offers a six times multiplier and the Nuclear plan offers a nine times multiplier.

pricing.title: Are there extra benefits to paid plans?
pricing.content: Paid plans include faster transaction priority in the network and priority withdrawal processing during high demand.

pricing.title: How can users earn Bitcoin-Yay for free?
pricing.content: Users earn Bitcoin-Yay for free through the Snatch Gopher plan referrals under the Pocket Gopher program and community contributions.

pricing.title: Are there any costs associated with referring friends?
pricing.content: There is no cost to referring friends and users earn bonus BTCY through successful referrals.

pricing.title: What are the subscription tiers called?
pricing.content: The subscription tiers are called Snatch Gopher Free Electric Gopher Turbo Gopher and Nuclear Gopher.

app.title: What can I do with the Bitcoin-Yay app?
app.content: You can mine BTCY view your mining rate and AI multiplier send and receive BTCY and Bitcoin and access staking and swaps.

app.title: Is the Bitcoin-Yay app easy to use?
app.content: The app is designed to be user‑friendly with guided tutorials for wallet setup mining and token conversions.

app.title: Can I use the Bitcoin-Yay app to send money?
app.content: Yes the app supports sending and receiving BTCY and Bitcoin to any valid address with minimal fees.

app.title: Does the app support biometric authentication?
app.content: The app supports biometric authentication for secure and convenient login using fingerprint or facial recognition.

app.title: How do I know how much Bitcoin-Yay I am earning?
app.content: The app dashboard displays your current base mining rate AI multiplier and total BTCY earned.

app.title: Does the app use a lot of battery?
app.content: The app is optimized for minimal battery usage because the heavy AI computations run on centralized servers.

app.title: Does the app have a built‑in wallet?
app.content: The app includes a fully non‑custodial wallet for BTCY and Bitcoin with secure key storage and backup options.

app.title: Can I buy Bitcoin-Yay in the app?
app.content: The app provides a fiat on‑ramp to purchase BTCY via credit card or other supported payment methods.

app.title: Can I stake my BTCY in the app?
app.content: Once you reach the staking threshold you can stake BTCY within the app to earn yield and governance voting power.

app.title: Does the app notify me of important updates?
app.content: The app sends push notifications for mining milestones incoming transactions governance proposals and security alerts.

app.title: Can I convert BTCY to other tokens in the app?
app.content: The app supports in‑app swaps to stablecoins and other Indexx ecosystem tokens once you meet the required thresholds.
